table.name: temperature_control
table.description: This table stores various user defined temperature ranges that can be used to categorize the items and commodities.

columns.name: TEMPERATURE_CONTROL_GID
columns.description: TEMPERATURE_CONTROL_GID contains the unique identifier for temperature control information for the item being shipped. Examples include: AMBIENT, INSULATED, REFRIGERATED

columns.name: TEMPERATURE_CONTROL_XID
columns.description: TEMPERATURE_CONTROL_XID contains the unique external identifier for the temperature control of the item being shipped.

columns.name: TEMPERATURE_CONTROL_NAME
columns.description: TEMPERATURE_CONTROL_NAME contains the temperature control name for the item being shipped.

columns.name: MIN_TEMP
columns.description: MIN_TEMP contains the minimum temperature at which the item can be shipped.

columns.name: MIN_TEMP_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for MIN_TEMP column.

columns.name: MAX_TEMP
columns.description: MAX_TEMP contains the maximum temperature at which the item can be shipped.

columns.name: MAX_TEMP_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for MAX_TEMP column.
